name: Swooping Season (PntherArt)
description:
Become Toronto's worst nightmare as you fufill your duties as an agent of chaos as a little menacing Australian Magpie. 

It's still in development of course, some things are not quite finished off yet (the vehicle situation lol and there should be npc's, trash and grafiti) but it will get there some day!

As usual attributes in read me x 

(MAC BUILD IS UNTESTED! I don't have a mac so Idk if it works lol)
